meanings.sent1: The small hill was surpassable for the experienced hiker.
meanings.sent2: The speed of the athlete was surpassable by his younger competitor.
meanings.sent3: The challenge was surpassable, but it required determination.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was surpassable only by her generosity.
meanings.sent5: The goal seemed surpassable with enough effort and focus.

meanings.sent1: The budget was surpassable if we cut down on unnecessary expenses.
meanings.sent2: The temperature was surpassable with the right insulation.
meanings.sent3: His appetite was surpassable only by his love for desserts.
meanings.sent4: The limit was surpassable with creative thinking and innovation.
meanings.sent5: The record was surpassable with proper training and dedication.
